channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New York GOP files complaint against U.S. Postal Service over destroyed political mailers
item.description: Over 200 political mailers advocating for GOP congressional candidate Alison Esposito were dumped by a creek in New York's Hudson Valley, and the Repu...

item.title: Secret Service 'mistakenly assessed' risks in Butler before Trump assassination attempt, review says
item.description: Multiple Secret Service agents involved in planning security for Donald Trump's July 13 campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, failed to properly mit...

item.title: Michigan Dem Slotkin leads as GOP aims to win 1st US Senate race in state since 1994: poll
item.description: Polls place Democratic Rep. Elissa Slotkin ahead of former Republican Rep. Mike Rogers in the 2024 Michigan U.S. Senate race.

item.title: Harris dealt a blow from poor October jobs report
item.description: U.S. employers added only 12,000 jobs in October, falling far short of forecasts and delivering a blow to Vice President Kamala Harris in the waning d...

item.title: Kamala Harris Sells Faux Unity — Yet Again
item.description: The Biden-Harris vision of unity is that Donald Trump goes away.

item.title: Key House projection spells trouble for two Republican lawmakers
item.description: The nonpartisan Cook Political Report has delivered bad news for two House Republican incumbents with Election Day just days away.

item.title: New House ratings in key races shift in favor of Democrats
item.description: Another election rater has shifted more House races to favor Democrats with four days left until Election Day.

item.title: ‘Bidenomics’ Brings In A Measly 12K New Jobs In October
item.description: The Biden-Harris administration has repeatedly had to revise its job totals downward.

item.title: FEC Complaint: Washington Post’s Paid Ads Boosting Harris And Criticizing Trump Violate Campaign Finance Rules
item.description: The Trump campaign filed a complaint against The Washington Post with the FEC over the paper's latest advertising campaign.

item.title: Ted Cruz knocks McConnell-aligned super PAC for 'zero support' in competitive race
item.description: Ted Cruz hit a McConnell-aligned group for not spending in his race, instead opting to focus on GOP pick-up opportunities in other states.

item.title: Biden-Harris White House Falsifies Transcript To Cover Up Biden’s ‘Garbage’ Slur Against GOP Voters
item.description: The edit by White House staff was met with ethical concerns by official stenographers.

item.title: Tariffs Are a Lousy Negotiating Tool
item.description: A strategic U.S. president would likely conclude that the risks and costs associated with tariffs-as-a-tactic would be remarkably high, if not unaccep...

item.title: Trump’s ‘Chickenhawk’ Attack on His GOP Critics Is Dumb, but Not Evil
item.description: Far from being craven warmongers, Liz Cheney, John Bolton, and other Republicans Trump and his supporters loathe advocate stable deterrence.

item.title: Judge Orders Arizona’s Elections Chief To Release The Names Of 218K Voters Lacking Citizenship Proof
item.description: Adrian Fontes failed to show that 'production of the records would violate rights of privacy or confidentiality or would be detrimental to the best in...

item.title: The Infuriating Case of a Chicago Synagogue-Goer’s Shooting
item.description: A Muslim illegal immigrant tried to kill an American Jew on the streets of the Windy City — and the government is caught between progressive pieties a...

item.title: Harvard, Northwestern failed Jewish students during college campus protests: House report
item.description: A new GOP-led antisemitism report revealed Harvard refused to call Hamas’ Oct. 7 "violent," and Northwestern considered taking Sabra hummus off campus...

item.title: Why You Should Always Double-Check Your Ballot: Kentucky Voting Machine Showed Trump Vote As Vote For Harris

item.title: Voters Should Reject Pro-Abortion Deception This November
item.description: They should not assent to the abortion industry’s demand for a radical regime of unsafe, unregulated, and unrestricted abortion.

item.title: Georgia county says more than 3,000 absentee ballots being mailed late just days before election
item.description: Election officials in Georgia's third-largest county said they're late in mailing more than 3,000 absentee ballots to voters just a few days before th...

item.title: McConnell issues smackdown of Kentucky Dem governor's call to abolish the Electoral College
